title: The Secret Story of Indians on Mars: A Prequel to The Mahabharata
description: A thrilling novel unfolding mysteries.Did aliens come to Earth?Where did The Aryans come to India from?Was there life on Mars?Can we avoid nuclear war?Can you live forever? Is it a boon?Why were pyramids built?Do aliens have wisdom?Can we be happy and content with a little courage, humour and wisdom?
author: Santosh Gangwani
